name: Isonvale
description:
**For best play experience, please play in fullscreen!** Isonvale Lead Programmer:

Cassidy Pong

Lead Artist:

Suli Zhang

Isonvale is a 2.5D exploratory, turn-based RPG game inspired by Octopath Traveler. Walk around and explore the fantastical land and interact with NPCs, or search for spells that will help aid you in battle.
